title: Art Director (Film, Television or Stage)
subtitle: Kaitohu Toi (Kiriata, Pouaka Whakaata, Whakaari rānei)
description: Art directors plan, organise and control artistic aspects of film, television or stage productions.

salary.text: Pay rates for art directors vary depending on the size, length and budget of the production.

title: Dancer
subtitle: Kaikanikani
description: Dancers entertain people by expressing ideas and emotions, usually to music, using body movements.

salary.text: Pay rates for dancers vary depending on ability, how often they work and what type of work they do.

title: Urban/Regional Planner
subtitle: Kaiwhakamahere Tāone/Rohe
description: Urban/regional planners develop and administer plans for physical, environmental, social and economic development of urban and rural areas.

salary.text: Planners usually earn $65K-$82K per year
Senior and principal planners usually earn $91K-150K per year

title: Emergency Management Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Whakahaere Ohotata
description: Emergency management officers plan for and respond to emergencies such as earthquakes and weather events. They also train communities to prepare for disasters.

salary.text: Emergency management officers with up to three years' experience usually earn $66K-$79K per year
Emergency management officers with three or more years' experience usually earn $79K-$95K per year

title: Mine/Quarry Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Huke Kōwaro
description: Mine and quarry managers supervise mine and quarry workers, do safety checks and plan activities in mines and quarries.

salary.text: Quarry managers usually earn $100K-$155K per year
Mine managers usually earn $130K-$210K per year

title: Foreign Policy Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Take Tāwāhi
description: Foreign policy officers represent New Zealand's interests overseas and provide policy advice to the Government on foreign affairs and trade issues.

salary.text: New foreign policy officers usually earn $63K-$69K per year
Foreign policy officers with experience usually earn $69K-$150K per year

title: Energy/Carbon Auditor
subtitle: Kaitātari Pūngao/Waro
description: Energy/carbon auditors assess the amount of energy used and carbon produced by organisations. They also recommend ways to increase energy efficiency.

salary.text: Energy/carbon auditors with up to five years' experience usually earn $60K-$80K per year
Energy/carbon auditors with five or more years' experience usually earn $80K-$200K per year

title: Television Presenter
subtitle: Kaipānui Pouaka Whakaata
description: Television presenters introduce, present or host programmes on television.

salary.text: Pay for television presenters varies depending on their profile, experience and responsibility.

title: Career Consultant
subtitle: Kaitohutohu Umanga
description: Career consultants help clients with career decision-making and development, job hunting, and returning to work after illness or accident.

salary.text: Career consultants working in schools or government agencies usually earn $47K-$77K per year

title: Facilities Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Whakaurunga
description: Facilities managers co-ordinate the strategic and operational management of buildings and facilities to ensure they are safe, healthy, sustainable, productive and fit-for-purpose.

salary.text: Facilities managers with one to four years' experience usually earn $55K-$100K per year
Senior facilities managers usually earn $100K-$150K per year

title: Aircraft Refueller
subtitle: Kaiwhakakī Waka Rererangi
description: Aircraft refuellers fill aircraft with fuel at airports.

salary.text: New aircraft refuellers usually earn $55K-$65K per year
Experienced aircraft refuellers usually earn $65K-$75K per year

title: Electronics Engineer
subtitle: Mataaro Tāhiko
description: Electronics engineers design and oversee production of electronic equipment such as radios, televisions, computers, washing machines and telecommunication systems. They may also work in sales and technical support.

salary.text: Electronics engineers usually earn an average of $100K per year

title: Dairy Processing Operator
subtitle: Kaiwhakamahi Pūrere Hua Miraka
description: Dairy processing operators oversee the operation of equipment used to produce a wide range of dairy products such as cheese, butter, yoghurt and milk powder.

salary.text: New dairy processing operators usually earn $50K-$60K per year
Senior dairy processing operators usually earn $70K-$80K per year

title: Surveyor
subtitle: Kairūri
description: Surveyors plan, direct and conduct survey work to determine the position of boundaries, locations, topographic features and built structures.

salary.text: Graduate surveyors usually earn $50K-$60K per year
Licensed surveyors usually earn $70K-$120K per year

title: Trainer
subtitle: Kaiwhakangungu/Kaiwhakaako
description: Trainers plan and provide training courses for employees of businesses, government and other organisations.

salary.text: Trainers usually earn $56K-$82K per year
Training advisers usually earn $82K-$128K per year

title: Media Producer
subtitle: Kaihautū Pāpāho
description: Media producers plan and produce films, television programmes, theatre productions, music, digital content, radio shows, festivals and other artistic activities.

salary.text: Pay rates for media producers vary as most are self-employed and work on short-term contracts.

title: Mortgage Broker
subtitle: Kaitakawaenga Pūtea Taurewa
description: Mortgage brokers offer financial advice to people wanting to buy a house or property and help them apply for a home loan.

salary.text: Mortgage brokers who are permanent employees usually earn $70K-$100K per year

title: Orchard Farmer/Manager
subtitle: Kaipāmu Uru Hua Rākau/Kaiwhakahaere Uru Hua Rākau
description: Orchard farmers/managers plan and manage fruit and nut production in orchards.

salary.text: Orchard farmers/managers with up to five years' experience usually earn $55K-$110K per year
Orchard farmers/managers working for large organisations usually earn $120K-$180K per year

title: Dairy Herd Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Māpu Kau
description: Dairy herd managers run daily dairy farming operations such as feeding and milking cows, monitoring animal health and environmental management.

salary.text: Assistant dairy herd managers usually earn $48K-$88K per year
Experienced dairy herd managers usually earn $51K-$90K per year

title: Insurance Loss Adjuster
subtitle: Kaiwhakatika Makeretanga Rīanga
description: Insurance loss adjusters investigate and calculate insurance claims.

salary.text: Insurance loss adjusters usually earn $56K-$88K per year
Senior or specialist loss adjusters usually earn $80K-$143K per year

title: Fishery Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Hao Ika
description: Fishery officers gather information on all aspects of the fishing industry and enforce fisheries laws.

salary.text: Fishery officers usually earn $61K-$100K per year

title: Agricultural/Horticultural Field Representative
subtitle: Māngai Taiao Ahuwhenua
description: Agricultural/horticultural field representatives sell products such as farm equipment, and advise clients on crop and livestock management.

salary.text: Agricultural/horticultural field representatives with up to three years’ experience usually earn $55K-$90K per year
Agricultural/horticultural field representatives with more than three years' experience usually earn $90K-$120K per year

title: Health and Safety Adviser
subtitle: Kaitohutohu Hauora-Haumaru
description: Health and safety advisers monitor workplace health and safety hazards, train employees on health and safety procedures, and investigate accidents.

salary.text: Health and safety advisers usually earn $50K-$90K per year

title: Massage Therapist
subtitle: Kaihaumanu Mirimiri
description: Massage therapists manipulate the soft tissue of people's bodies to treat health problems and to help people relax.

salary.text: Pay for massage therapists varies depending on how many clients they have.

title: Statistician
subtitle: Kaitatau
description: Statisticians design studies and surveys, and collect, analyse, interpret and present numerical information to assist in decision-making.

salary.text: New statisticians usually earn $55K-$65K per year
Statisticians with experience usually earn $75K-$140K per year

title: Police Officer
subtitle: Pirihimana
description: Police officers work to prevent and solve crime, keep the peace, and respond to criminal activities and emergencies.

salary.text: Police officers with one to four years’ experience usually earn $69K-$76K per year

title: Artistic Director
subtitle: Kaihautū Toi
description: Artistic directors plan and direct the activities of performing arts organisations such as theatre and dance companies, and arts activities at festivals and venues.

salary.text: Pay rates for artistic directors vary depending on your ability, experience, and what type of work you do.

title: Entertainer
subtitle: Kaiwhakangahau
description: Entertainers perform a variety of acts, such as dance, drama or acrobatics, to entertain an audience.

salary.text: Pay for entertainers varies depending on your ability, how often you work and what type of work you do.

title: Corrections Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Whare Herehere
description: Corrections officers are responsible for keeping prisoners safe and secure and motivating them to make changes in their lives.

salary.text: Corrections officers usually earn $60K-$69K per year
Senior and principal corrections officers usually earn $75K-$88K per year

title: Director (Film, Television, Radio or Stage)
subtitle: Kaitohu (Kiriata, Pouaka Whakaata, Irirangi, Whakaari rānei)
description: Directors instruct cast and crew and oversee the artistic and production aspects of film, television, radio or stage creations.

salary.text: Pay rates for directors vary depending on your ability, experience, and what type of work you do.

title: Forestry Scientist
subtitle: Kaipūtaiao Ngahere
description: Forestry scientists research forest growth, wood processing, conservation and different types of trees, and how these can be used.

salary.text: Forestry scientists usually earn $55K-$98K per year
Senior forestry scientists usually earn $110K-$150K per year

title: Funeral Director/Embalmer
subtitle: Kaihautū/Kaiwhakapaipai Tūpāpaku
description: Funeral directors/embalmers organise and direct funerals, register deaths, and prepare human bodies for visits by families, and for burial or cremation.

salary.text: Funeral directors/embalmers usually earn $50K-$60K per year

title: Quarantine Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Ārai Mate Hōrapa
description: Quarantine officers identify and control biosecurity risks at New Zealand's borders by inspecting goods and vessels arriving in the country.

salary.text: New quarantine officers usually earn $57K-$59K per year
Senior quarantine officers usually earn $67K-$70K per year

title: Tattoo Artist
subtitle: Ringa Kirituhi
description: Tattoo artists use sterilised skin-piercing equipment and ink or jewellery to decorate people's skin.

salary.text: Pay rates for tattoo artists vary depending on your talent and how well you promote your service.

title: Minister of Religion
subtitle: Amorangi
description: Ministers of religion provide leadership, guidance and training for members of a religious group.

salary.text: Ministers of religion may receive an allowance, or work voluntarily.

title: Elected Government Representative
subtitle: Māngai ā-Pōtitanga
description: Elected government representatives are elected by the people of a specific area to help govern a city, region or country.

salary.text: Members of parliament usually earn $160K-$300K per year
Local government representatives usually earn $2K-$190K per year

title: Energy and Chemical Plant Operator
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Rawa Pūngao, Rawa Matū
description: Energy and chemical plant operators monitor, control and maintain machinery and equipment at industrial sites such as power stations.

salary.text: New energy and chemical plant operators usually earn $70K-$80K per year
Energy and chemical plant operators with five or more years' experience usually earn $80K-$180K per year

title: Forest Manager
subtitle: Kaimahi Ngahere
description: Forest managers plan and direct the planting, growth, harvesting and protection of forests for wood production.

salary.text: Forest managers with up to five years' experience usually earn $55K-$95K per year
Senior forest managers usually earn $95K-$150K per year

title: Health and Safety Inspector
subtitle: Kaimātai Hauora-Haumaru
description: Health and safety inspectors assess workplaces and work activities to determine if employers are keeping workers and other people safe and healthy at work. They also educate people about health and safety, investigate accidents and lead prosecutions.

salary.text: Trainee and newly warranted health and safety inspectors usually earn $61K-$66K per year
Fully trained health and safety inspectors with at least five years' experience usually earn $76K-$93K per year

title: Dairy Farm Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Pāmu Kau
description: Dairy farm managers manage farming operations and staff for dairy farm owners.

salary.text: Dairy farm managers usually earn $63K-$120K per year
Dairy operations managers usually earn $65K-$160K per year

title: Ophthalmologist
subtitle: Tākuta Whakaora Whatu
description: Ophthalmologists diagnose and treat eye conditions and injuries, and perform eye surgery.

salary.text: Trainee ophthalmologists usually earn $58K-$195K per year
Experienced ophthalmologists usually earn $152K-$240K per year

title: Epidemiologist
subtitle: Kaimātai Tahumaero
description: Epidemiologists study the causes, transmission and distribution of diseases in population groups to inform public health programmes and prevent the spread of disease.

salary.text: New epidemiologists usually earn $50K-$86K per year
Epidemiologists with experience usually earn $75K–$175K per year

title: Wool Classer
subtitle: Kaimāhiti Wūru
description: Wool classers sort wool into categories. They ensure wool is clean, identified and documented for sale.

salary.text: Wool classers are paid per fleece and usually earn $50-$60 per hour

title: Upholsterer
subtitle: Kaiwhakapaipai Uhinga Waka
description: Upholsterers make or repair the springs, padding, linings and covers of furniture.

salary.text: Trainee upholsterers usually earn $44K-$50K per year
Qualified upholsterers usually earn $50K-$62K per year

title: Health Services Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Ratonga Hauora
description: Health services managers are responsible for the day-to-day running of a hospital, primary health organisation (PHO), clinic or community health service.

salary.text: Health services managers with up to five years’ experience usually earn $65K-$125K per year
Health services managers with five or more years’ experience usually earn $125K-$245K per year

title: Management Consultant
subtitle: Kaitohutohu Whakahaere
description: Management consultants work with organisations to solve problems and recommend improvements to strengthen business performance.

salary.text: Management consultants with up to five years' experience usually earn $50K-$100K per year
Highly skilled management consultants usually earn $100K-$250K per year

title: Actor
subtitle: Kaitapere
description: Actors entertain people by using body movement and speech to play a character in media and stage productions.

salary.text: Pay rates for actors vary depending on your ability, how often you work and what type of work you do.

title: Agricultural/Horticultural Scientist
subtitle: Kaipūtaiao Ahuwhenua
description: Agricultural/horticultural scientists study farm animals, soils, pastures and crops to improve growth, health and quality, and to prevent pests and disease.

salary.text: Graduate agricultural/horticultural scientists usually earn $65K-$75K per year
Senior agricultural/horticultural scientists usually earn $80K-$150K per year

title: Product Assembler
subtitle: Kaiwaihanga Taputapu
description: Product assemblers put together parts of metal products, machinery, electrical and electronic equipment, telecommunications equipment, joinery products and other goods.

salary.text: Product assemblers with up to three years’ experience usually earn $44K-$45K per year
Product assemblers with more than three years’ experience usually earn $45K-$50K per year

title: Biosecurity Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Ao Koiora
description: Biosecurity officers check areas of land for harmful animals or plants and arrange for, or help with, pest destruction and control.

salary.text: Biosecurity officers with one to three years’ experience usually earn $50K-$60K per year
Biosecurity officers with more than three years’ experience usually earn $60K-$100K per year

title: Conservator
subtitle: Kaiatawhai Whakaora Taonga
description: Conservators help preserve art and other important historical items by preventing deterioration and repairing damage.

salary.text: Conservators with one to five years' experience usually earn $55K-$70K per year
Conservators with more than 10 years' experience usually earn $70K-$82K per year

title: Policy Analyst
subtitle: Kaitātari Kaupapa
description: Policy analysts gather and analyse information to assist in the planning, development, interpretation and review of government or industrial policies.

salary.text: Policy analysts usually earn $68K-$116K per year
Policy analysts working as principal advisors usually earn $132K-$155K per year

title: Probation Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Matakana
description: Probation officers supervise offenders serving a sentence in the community. They also help ex-prisoners return to society.

salary.text: Probation officers usually earn $54K-$60K per year
Senior probation officers usually earn $60K-$69K per year

title: Environmental/Public Health Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Hauora Taiao/Pāpori
description: Environmental/public health officers investigate, monitor, assess and advise on food and alcohol safety, disease prevention, disease outbreaks, and environmental hazards such as pollution.

salary.text: Graduate environmental/public health officers usually earn $48K-$70K per year
Experienced environmental/public health officers usually earn $55K-$85K per year

title: Geophysicist
subtitle: Kaimātai Pūtaiao Whenua
description: Geophysicists use data-collecting technology to study natural processes of the Earth, such as earthquake and volcanic activity, and to locate minerals, oil and gas, or groundwater.

salary.text: New geophysicists usually earn $65K-$75K per year
Senior geophysicists usually earn $120K-$180K per year

title: Marine Engineer
subtitle: Mataaro Kaipuke
description: Marine engineers operate, service and repair engines, and mechanical and electronic equipment on ships and boats.

salary.text: New marine engineers usually earn $60K-$80K per year
Experienced marine engineers usually earn $80K-$180K per year

title: Biomedical Technician
subtitle: Kaihangarau Utauta Whakaora
description: Biomedical technicians make, modify, maintain and repair mechanical and electronic medical equipment such as clinical machines, surgical instruments and implants.

salary.text: Biomedical technicians usually earn $58K-$86K per year
Senior biomedical technicians usually earn $87K-$104K per year

title: Ranger
subtitle: Āpiha Papa Atawhai
description: Rangers protect, enhance and maintain conservation and recreation areas such as regional and national parks, forests, wetlands, reserves, and sites of cultural importance.

salary.text: New rangers usually earn $47K-$60K per year
Experienced rangers usually earn $53K-$93K per year

title: Marine Biologist
subtitle: Kaimātai Koiora Moana
description: Marine biologists study animals and plants that live in the sea, and how they interact with their surroundings.

salary.text: New marine biologists usually earn $55K-$80K per year
Experienced marine biologists usually earn $83K-$190K per year

title: Game Developer
subtitle: Kaihanga Tākaro
description: Game developers write, design, program, animate and test games for computers, gaming consoles, tablets and mobile phones.

salary.text: New game developers usually earn $60K-$80K per year
Experienced game developers usually earn $80K-$100K per year

title: Forensic Scientist
subtitle: Kaipūtaiao Taihara
description: Forensic scientists apply scientific knowledge and skills to investigating crimes and helping the police find or eliminate crime suspects. They may also do research into developing or improving forensic techniques.

salary.text: Forensic scientists assisting crime investigations usually earn $54K-$81K per year
Senior forensic scientists usually earn $79K-$151K per year

title: Lift Technician
subtitle: Kaihangarau Waka Kawe
description: Lift technicians install, maintain and repair lift and escalator systems.

salary.text: Lift technicians usually earn $55K-$75K per year
Senior or highly qualified lift technicians usually earn $75K-$100K per year

title: Building and Construction Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Hanga Whare
description: Building and construction managers plan, control and co-ordinate civil engineering or building projects, and the resources and people involved.

salary.text: Building and construction managers usually earn $92K-$224K per year

title: Visual Merchandiser
subtitle: Kaiwhakatū Taonga ā-Matapihi
description: Visual merchandisers arrange goods and make displays in shops, shop windows and at events to attract the attention of customers.

salary.text: Visual merchandisers who work in-store usually earn $44K-$55K per year
Visual merchandisers who oversee multiple stores usually earn $55K-$200K per year

title: Workplace Relations Adviser
subtitle: Kaitohutohu Takawaenga Mahi
description: Workplace relations advisers provide advice and mediation to different groups in the workplace to prevent and resolve workplace disputes.

salary.text: Workplace relations advisers usually earn $92K-$122K per year
Workplace relations managers usually earn $102K-$163K per year

title: Health Promoter
subtitle: Kaiwhakatairanga Hauora
description: Health promoters work with communities and groups to develop ways to improve people’s health. They also work with government agencies to improve environmental conditions.

salary.text: Qualified health promoters usually earn $58K-$86K per year
Senior health promoters can earn $87K-$119K per year

title: Radiation Therapist
subtitle: Kaihaumanu Pūhihi
description: Radiation therapists are part of a specialised team that uses radiation to treat diseases, mostly cancers, in patients.

salary.text: Radiation therapists usually earn $66K-$98K per year
Radiation therapists with extra responsibilities or expertise usually earn $101K-$124K per year

title: Building Surveyor
subtitle: Kairūri Whare
description: Building surveyors inspect plans and building constructions to see if buildings are, or will be, built correctly. They may also issue certificates, write reports and help owners and potential buyers with construction problems and solutions.

salary.text: Building surveyors usually earn between $61K-$112K per year

title: Court Registry Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Whakarite Kōti/Ture
description: Court registry officers assist with the day-to-day operation of courts. They handle court documents, schedules and may support the judge in running court hearings.

salary.text: Court registry officers usually earn $50K-$70K per year

title: Landscape Architect
subtitle: Kaihoahoa Whenua
description: Landscape architects plan, design and advise on the construction of urban, rural, residential and public landscapes. They also manage and conserve natural or heritage landscapes and public open spaces.

salary.text: Landscape architects usually earn $80K-$120K per year

title: Crop Farmer/Manager
subtitle: Kaiahuwhenua Huangakai/Kaiwhakahaere Huangakai
description: Crop farmers/managers plan and manage plant production on farms and in vineyards and hothouses.

salary.text: Crop farmers/managers with up to five years' experience usually earn $55K-$110K per year
Crop farmers/managers working for large organisations usually earn $120K-$180K per year

title: Film/Television Camera Operator
subtitle: Kaitango Whakaahua Whitiāhua/Pouaka Whakaata
description: Film and television camera operators use digital and film cameras to record events and scenes for television, movies and videos.

salary.text: New film/television camera operators usually earn $30-$50 per hour
Experienced film/television camera operators usually earn $64-$120 per hour

title: Interior Designer
subtitle: Kaitātai o-Roto
description: Interior designers plan, design, decorate and furnish spaces in residential, commercial, retail and leisure environments.

salary.text: Interior designers with up to seven years' experience usually earn $55K-$95K per year
Senior interior designers with more than seven years' experience usually earn $90K-$120K per year

title: Telecommunications Engineer
subtitle: Mataaro Whitiwhiti Kōrero
description: Telecommunications engineers design, test and build telecommunications networks and systems.

salary.text: Telecommunications engineers with up to three years’ experience usually earn $60K-$65K per year
Telecommunications engineers with more than three years’ experience usually earn $65K-$140K per year

title: Customs Officer
subtitle: Āpiha Taupare
description: Customs officers control the entry and departure of goods, ships, planes and people to and from New Zealand.

salary.text: Customs officers usually earn $54K-$73K per year
Chief customs officers usually earn $98K-$125K per year

title: Case Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Kēhi
description: Case managers work with individuals and families to help them overcome hardship, and access social services and support.

salary.text: New case managers usually earn $60K-$66K per year
Case managers with experience usually earn $66K-$117K per year

title: Valuer
subtitle: Kaiwhakatau Wāriu
description: Valuers assess the value of real estate or personal property such as art and jewellery, for sales, rentals, mortgages, insurance or rates.

salary.text: Valuers with up to three years' experience usually earn $56K-$87K per year
Valuers with over three years' experience usually earn $87K-$138K per year

title: Architect
subtitle: Kaihoahoa Whare
description: Architects plan, design and advise on the construction and alteration of buildings and other structures.

salary.text: Architectural graduates usually earn $59K-$77K per year
Architects with more than five years' experience usually earn $82K-$143K per year

title: Architectural Technician
subtitle: Kaihangarau Hoahoa Whare
description: Architectural technicians create drawings and make models of building structures, research construction materials, and assist with building consent processes.

salary.text: Architectural technicians usually earn $70K-$125K per year

title: Civil Engineering Technician/Draughtsperson
subtitle: Kaihangarau/Kaihoahoa Mataaro Metarahi
description: Civil engineering technicians/draughtspeople plan and draw the technical details for building and repairing roads, bridges, buildings and other structures.

salary.text: Civil engineering technicians/draughtspeople with one to four years' experience usually earn $50K-$70K per year
Civil engineering technicians/draughtspeople with more than four years' experience usually earn $70K-$110K per year

title: Driller
subtitle: Kaipoka
description: Drillers assemble, position, and operate drilling rigs and related equipment to extract ores, liquids, and gases from the earth.

salary.text: New drillers usually earn $60K-$70K per year
Experienced drillers usually earn $70K-$150K per year

title: Mining Engineer
subtitle: Mataaro Waro
description: Mining engineers plan, prepare, design and manage the development of opencast (above ground) or underground mines.

salary.text: Graduate mining engineers usually earn $70-$75K per year
Experienced mining engineers usually earn $75K-$210K per year

title: Miner/Quarry Worker
subtitle: Kaimahi Huke Kōwaro
description: Miners and quarry workers operate machinery, vehicles and equipment to extract and process minerals and rocks.

salary.text: Quarry workers usually earn $60K-$80K per year
Miners usually earn $80K-$150K per year

title: Electrical Engineering Technician
subtitle: Kaihangarau Take Pūhiko
description: Electrical engineering technicians interpret the designs and technical instructions of electrical engineers, then ensure they are accurately carried out. They also develop, install, test and maintain equipment that produces, transmits or uses power.

salary.text: New electrical engineering technicians usually earn $22-$27 per hour
Senior electrical engineering technicians usually earn $34-$43 per hour

title: Electrical Engineer
subtitle: Mataaro Pūhiko
description: Electrical engineers design, construct and manufacture electrical systems. They also maintain, operate and manage these systems.

salary.text: The median salary for electrical engineers is $110K per year

title: Firefighter
subtitle: Kaitinei Ahi
description: Firefighters control and put out fires, help rescue people and animals, and educate the public about fire safety and fire prevention.

salary.text: Firefighters usually earn $54K-$77K per year
Station officers usually earn $88K-$108K per year

title: Early Childhood Teacher
subtitle: Kaiako Kōhungahunga
description: Early childhood teachers educate and care for young children in kindergartens, kōhanga reo or childcare centres. Kōhanga reo kaiako also help children learn te reo Māori and tikanga Māori (culture and customs).

salary.text: Qualified early childhood teachers usually earn $49K-$75K per year
Senior early childhood teachers usually earn $75K-$100K per year

title: Train Driver
subtitle: Kaitaraiwa Rerewhenua
description: Train drivers drive passenger or freight trains to destinations. They may also shift (shunt) carriages and wagons using trains or remote controls.

salary.text: Trainee train drivers usually earn $23-$38 per hour
Qualified train drivers usually earn $41-$50 per hour

title: Financial Adviser
subtitle: Kaiwhakatakoto Kaupapa Pūtea
description: Financial advisers give advice about financial planning, investing, insurance and other financial services.

salary.text: Financial advisers with one to three years' experience usually earn $70K-$120K per year
Financial advisers with three to seven years' experience usually earn $100K-$250K per year

title: Insurance Adviser
subtitle: Kaitohutohu Inihua
description: Insurance advisers give advice about insurance and sell insurance to clients.

salary.text: Insurance advisers usually earn $60K-$100K per year
Experienced insurance advisers usually earn $70K-$130K per year

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
subtitle: Kaiwhakahaere Hokohoko
description: Sales and marketing managers plan and direct the development, promotion and sale of an organisation's goods and services.

salary.text: Sales managers usually earn $100K-$200K per year
Marketing managers usually earn $96K-$230K per year

title: Barrister
subtitle: Rōia Kōti
description: Barristers give legal advice and appear on behalf of clients in civil, family and criminal cases in courts and tribunals.

salary.text: New barristers usually earn $53K-$58K per year
Barristers with more than two years' experience usually earn $55K-$175K per year

title: Anaesthetist
subtitle: Kairehu
description: Anaesthetists give anaesthesia (gas or injections to prevent pain) during surgery and other procedures. They assess patients and resuscitate them if necessary.

salary.text: Trainee anaesthetists usually earn $86K-$197K per year
Experienced anaesthetists usually earn $164K-$244K per year

title: Surgeon
subtitle: Rata Hāparapara
